hero.subtext:
At John's House of Coffee, we only brew the freshest coffee from all around the world.
We also serve pastries such as cupcakes and brownies.

about.subtext: John's Coffee House is a small shop set up in the front of the brandâ€™s roasting facility that specializes in to-go orders. Find the coffee at restaurants around town, including just around the corner at Star Lounge, Dark Matter's comfortable coffee shop, which has seats for lounging, plus Do-Rite Donuts.

members.name: John
members.quote: Far far away, behind the word mountains, far from the countries Vokalia and Consonantia, there live the blind texts.
